p:
Ribavirin is approved for the treatment of RSV in children, including hematopoietic stem cell transplant recipients. When used for the treatment of RSV pneumonia, ribavirin is usually given by the aerosol route, which delivers high concentrations at the site of infection.
152 Oral ribavirin has also been used with good outcomes.
153 Ribavirin has been used, off-label, for the treatment of HSV, influenza, severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus,
154, 155 La Crosse encephalitis,
156 Nipah encephalitis,
157 Lassa fever,
158 hemorrhagic fever with renal syndrome,
159 Crimean-Congo hemorrhagic fever,
160, 161 Bolivian hemorrhagic fever,
162 and hantavirus pulmonary syndrome.
